ingredients.ingredient: 20 extra-large shrimp, peeled, deveined, and tails removed

cookingTips: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels before stuffing to help prosciutto adhere properly
Use a butterfly cut to create a pocket in the shrimp for easier filling
Cook over medium-high heat for 2-3 minutes per side until shrimp are pink and opaque
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on properly deveining shrimp and creating the right pocket depth for stuffing without tearing the delicate flesh.
